unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Needed especially after last year's monsoon. Farmer Ramlal from UP told me losses were huge. Heard PMFBY helped some. Anyone got paid out after the 20/07/2023 floods? I registered at 14:00 hrs on 21/07/2023. Heard SBI General is good. Rs. 5000 premium is steep though, Baba! Is it worth it this year too, after the 10/08/2024 heatwave? Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Needed especially after last year's monsoon. Farmer Ramlal from U P told me losses were huge. Heard P M F B Y helped some. Anyone got paid out after the twentieth july two thousand and twenty three floods? I registered at fourteen hundred hours on twenty first july two thousand and twenty three. Heard S B I General is good. Rupee five thousand premium is steep though, Baba! Is it worth it this year too, after the tenth august two thousand and twenty four heatwave? Jai Kisan!
